description.narrative: Review and enhance the child focus of the monitoring and evaluation system of Egypt’s Takafol and Karama Cash Transfer Programme.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

comment.narrative: 6. Phase six: Report on best practices to include non-nationals in the national SP systems and; Peer review of the 3 poverty studies (Poverty Dynamics; Regional Poverty; Child Poverty);

- Report forseen for December, 2020;
- Peer review finished and delivered to the partner.
